ValidationRule.description: Since contact name is editable once the record is "On Error" it needs to not be changed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "ReadyTalk Contact", ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "AddError") ,
OR (ISCHANGED( FirstName ), ISCHANGED(LastName) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The contact name may not be changed when there is an error. Fix the phone error first.
